abstract: Op-Ed article by Morning Star Co founder Chris Rufer calls for end to the Export-Import Bank, arguing that it represents little more than source of corporate welfare; questions claim that bank will net $14 billion in additional tax revenue over next decade, saying it fails to account for market risk of bank's loans; holds bank essentially benefits participating corporations at taxpayer expense.
lead_paragraph: The Ex-Im Bank benefits big companies and hurts taxpayers.
snippet: The Ex-Im Bank benefits big companies and hurts taxpayers.
